name: VALUE Plan Real Estate Agent Website
description:
VALUE PLAN

$199.00
Monthly Hosting $17.99

Your VALUE PLAN website includes:

- Custom Property Search Form
- Home Evaluation Contact Form
- Search for Homes page (through your local MLS)
- Search your Listings (through your local MLS)
- Public & Private School page
- Private School page
- Local Attractions page
- Contact page
- Map to Office page
- Local Government Resources page
- Mortgage Calculator & Rates page
- Submission of website to 50 High Page Rank web directories
- One FREE Showcase Home Website (.info)

name: PRO Plan Real Estate Agent Website
description:
PRO PLAN

$299.00
Monthly Hosting $39.99

Your PRO PLAN website includes:

- Customized slide show with full screen capacity 
(each listing formatted with property address & MLS number)
- Free Credit Report information page
- Formatted Word Press blog
- Blog postings headlines updated on front page (optional)
- Mortgage Glossary
- Real Estate Glossary
- Home Page Contact Form 
- Home Evaluation Contact Form
- Search for Homes page (through your local MLS)
- Search your Listings (through your local MLS)
- Public & Private School page
- Private School page
- Local Attractions page
- Contact page
- Map to Office page
- Local Government Resources page
- Mortgage Calculator & Rates page
- Submission of website to 150 High Page Rank web directories
- One FREE Showcase Home Website (info)

name: 1 - Showcase Home Website (.info)
description:
One website for one house with it's own unique domain name. 

Perfect for real estate agents who want to go the extra mile for their clients. An extremely affordable investment that points buyers directly to the property you are selling, without the hassle of searching throughout the entire MLS to locate the listing.

Showcase Home Websites are referral magic. Homeowners love this type of attention. It is a snap to promote your listings to such classified sites such as Craigslist & Back Page by displaying a simple domain address - the address of the property.
 
Showcase Home Websites include a REQUEST PROPERTY LISTINGS form and a HOME EVALUATION form that captures leads and delivers them directly to your e-mail inbox.

Your Showcase Home Website includes:

 - Domain name (.info)
 - Slide show on home page (up to 20 photos) with full screen capabilites
 - Photo page (up to 20 photos)
 - Map page (featured property)
 - Local resource page
 - Estimate payment page
 - Request Listings contact form
 - Home Evaluation contact form
 - Office page with map
 - Printable sales flyer (that you provide)
 - Printable personal brochure (that you provide)

 - Hosting included in price for 12 months
 - Updates and maintenance for 12 months

 - Bookmarking / Social Networking button
 - Links back to your personal website
